tu.tuv: [dauṣ]prajñyamalasaṃkleśena |
六者惡慧垢染汚。
六者惡慧垢雜染。
’chal pa’i śes rab kyi dri ma kun nas ñon moṅs pa daṅ |
the taint of misunderstanding,
aśuśrūṣāsaṃkleśena |
七者不遵尊教垢染汚。
七者無聞垢雜染。
sri źu med pa’i dri ma kun nas ñon mṅos [should be moṅs] pa daṅ |
the taint of inattentiveness,
vicikitsāmalasaṃkleśena |
八者邪疑垢染汚。
八者疑惑垢雜染。
the tshom yi dri ma kun nas ñon moṅs pa daṅ |
the taint of doubt,
anadhimuktimalasaṃkleśena
九者不信解垢染汚。
九者無信解垢雜染。
ma mos pa’i dri ma kun nas ñon moṅs pa daṅ |
the taint of mistrust,
agauravamalasaṃkleśena ca daśamena |
十者不恭敬垢染汚。
十者不尊重垢雜染。
ma gus pa’i dri ma kun nas ñon moṅs par daṅ bcu ste |
and the taint of disrespect.
ebhir gṛhapate daśabhiḥ saṃkleśaiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ lokasanniveśaṃ drṣṭvāsaṃkliṣṭām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyāmīti
長者。我見衆生以如是等十染汚法之所染汚。爲得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提證於無染無上法故。
如是十種諸雜染法世間合集。我見是已。普令安住無雜染法。是故我乃淨信出家。趣證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提果

khyim bdag ’jig rten gnas pa ’di ni kun nas ñon moṅs pa bcu po de dag gis kun nas ñon moṅs par mthoṅ nas kun nas ñon moṅs pa med pa’i bla na med pa yaṅ dag par rdzogs pa’i byaṅ chub mṅon par rdzogs par ’tshaṅ rgya bar bya’o ||
Householder, when I saw that one who is involved with the world is defiled by these ten vices, I decided to attain undefiled unsurpassed perfect awakening.
śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ ||
以淨信心捨釋氏家趣無上道。
爾時世尊。重説偈言
źes dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byuṅ ṅo ||
With that conviction, I left ordinary household life behind and became a renunciant.”
iyam atra dharmatā tatredam ucyate ||
爾時世尊。欲重宣此義。而説頌曰
世間相續法 十雜染逼迫著有爲雜染 暫時無疲懈
’di la chos ñid ni ’di yin te | de la ’di skad ces bya’o ||
To emphasize that this is the way things are, he said the following:
yad bhūyasā ayaṃ loko daśasaṃkleśapīḍitaḥ |saṃkliṣṭasaṃskṛtābhirato nodvijanti kadā cana ||
世多分衆生 十染所逼迫樂有爲煩惱 曾不生厭離
諸愚夫異生 慳垢所染汚戒學攝衆生 破壞而不具
’jig rten ’di dag phal cher ni || kun nas ñon moṅs bcu yis gzir ||’dus byas kun nas ñon moṅs dga’ || nam yaṅ skyo bar byed mi ’gyur ||
No matter how much those in this worldare tortured by the ten kinds of corruption,they still take joy in the various combinations of corruptions,and never grow tired of them.
mātsaryamalasaṃkliṣṭāḥ sarvabālapṛthagjanāḥ |samādiyāmi śikṣāya cchidracārī asaṃyatāḥ ||
慳垢所染汚 一切愚凡夫犯戒非寂靜 不習三摩地
愚者背忍辱 懈怠劣精進不能安定心 惡慧而癡鈍
byis pa so so’i skye bo kun || ser sna’i dri mas ñon moṅs te ||bslab pa yaṅ dag bzuṅ nas kyaṅ || sdom pa med ciṅ ñams par spyod ||
All immature common people,defiled by the taint of envy,say “I will assume the training”,but are faulty in conduct and lack discipline.
kṣāntīye vimukhā bālāḥ kusīdā hīnavīryakāḥ |anavasthitacittāś ca duḥprajñā jaḍamomuhāḥ ||
瞋垢背忍辱 懈怠退正勤其心不專住 惡慧愚鈍者
父母及尊長 師尊皆遠離不見世光明 惡慧起疑念
byis pa bzod la rgyab kyis phyogs || brtson ’grus chuṅ ba le lo can || sems kyaṅ gnas pa ma yin pa || śes rab ’chal pa blun źiṅ rmoṅs ||
Fools turn their back on patience,they are lazy and lack vigor.Their minds are fickle,and they are deluded by misunderstanding.
mātāpitṛṣu jyeṣṭheṣu guruśuśrūṣavarjitāḥ |dṛṣṭvāna lokapradyotaṃ buddhe kāṃkṣanti durmatī ||
於父母師長 不遵奉言教疑見網衆生 不求照世覺
佛説甚深法 而生於毀謗癡暗法所覆 聖法不尊重
pha daṅ ma daṅ phu bo daṅ | bla ma la ni sri źu spaṅs || ’jig rten snaṅ mdzad saṅs rgyas dag | mthoṅ nas blo ṅan nem nur byed ||
They lack reverence for parents,for elders, and for teachers,and even when they see the light of the world,the buddhas, the weak-minded still doubt.
pratikṣipanti saddharmaṃ gambhīraṃ jinabhāṣitam* |tamaskandhena onaddhā āryaskandhe agauravāḥ ||
誹謗於甚深 佛所説妙法被服無明蘊 聖蘊懷輕賤
見雜染法已 不著於有爲無爲無染汚 令衆生寂滅
zab mo rgyal bas gsuṅs pa yi || dam pa’i chos ni spoṅ bar byed || mun pa’i phuṅ pos rab tu khebs || ’phags pa’i tshogs la gus mi byed ||
They reject the authentic teaching,the profound utterances of the Victorious One.Tied down by dull skandhasthey have no admiration for the noble assembly.
imān saṃkleśaṃ paśyitvā na ratiḥ saṃskṛte kvacit* <|>asaṃskṛtām asaṃkliṣṭāṃ prāpuṇiṣyāmi nirvṛtiṃ ||
觀是染汚已 誰樂處有爲當勤證寂滅 無爲無染汚
kun nas ñon moṅs ’di gzigs nas || ’dus byas gaṅ la ’aṅ mi dga’ ste | ñon moṅs med pa ’dus ma byas || mya ṅan ’das pa thob par bya ||
Having seen this corruption,I took no joy in anything conditionedand decided to attain cessation,the unconditioned, the uncorrupted.
